title: Chapter 4565 - Chapter 4565: 4564 Combat Strength Of 40 Chaos Levels!
body:
Chapter 4565 - Chapter 4565: 4564 Combat Strength Of 40 Chaos Levels!

Chapter 4565: 4564 combat strength of 40 chaos levels!

The change of the world, the change of the living beings.

Wang Xian’s preaching began.

Below, all the strong disciples from the four major forces looked on with shock on their faces.

They watched the beginning of chaos, the evolution of the universe, and the birth of the Holy Spirit.

They watched the birth of all living things, the rise of the mountains and seas, and the great changes of the world.

The current Wang Xian had already walked into an unknown realm. He could evolve everything below the chaos level, including the chaos level.

The accumulation of energy and the breakthrough of shackles.

However, all of these were extremely mysterious. He needed to observe and comprehend them himself.

When Wang Xian had evolved for two hundred years, there were disciples in the ruler realm who started to break through.

Large-scale breakthroughs.

There were disciples from the Dragon Palace and disciples from other peak races in the nine-origin universe.

This batch of disciples in the ruler realm whose strength had decreased started to have energy fluctuations in their bodies. They started to break through the shackles one by one.

The number of breakthroughs reached one-third of the shock level.

The group of Heavenly Yuan creation realm experts sensed it and their faces were filled with shock.

By the 300th year, a large number of disciples who were at the peak of the level 8 realm of the universe ruler realm started to break through.

Especially the disciples who were already at the peak of the level 8 realm of the universe ruler realm. One of them must have broken through.

After 400 years of preaching, more than 300 peak level ruler realm disciples had broken through. As long as they had a spot in the universe, they could break through to the Heavenly Yuan destiny realm at any time.

After 500 years, the ruler realm disciples didn’t understand. However, they knew that this was a great opportunity for them. It was the path of Heavenly Yuan destiny.

Even if they didn’t understand, they wanted to remember it in their hearts.

Five hundred years later, some heavenly yuan creation realm experts gradually came to a realization. Energy began to boil in their bodies as they saw the path ahead and the path to breakthrough.

Even experts at the Great Dao realm were greatly moved.

In fact, at the final moment, the Justice Alliance’s Primal Chaos Realm Existences, the two primal chaos realm existences from the ten-day federation and the four Primal Chaos Realm existences from the Behemoth Alliance were all excitedly listening and watching.

Their faces were filled with excitement and excitement.

They could see the road ahead.

However, it was a pity that the evolution was too fast. In just a few hundred years, the evolution was not completely completed.

“A thousand years have passed. The preaching is over.”

“You can communicate here or leave. The Dragon Palace’s celebration is also over.”

A thousand years had passed and Wang Xian had finished his preaching. Seeing that all the strong disciples were still immersed in the preaching, he spoke indifferently.

Then, he left immediately!

“Thank You, Your Majesty Dragon King, for imparting the Dharma.”

The group of strong disciples regained their senses slightly and congratulated him hurriedly.

After all the strong disciples thanked him, they sat there motionlessly when they saw Wang Xian leave.

They were still immersed in their thoughts and memories. None of the strong ones left.

Although the disciples in the ruler realm had regained their senses, how could they leave if the masters in the Heaven’s origin manifestation level had not left?

Some of the powerhouses had an epiphany and wanted to cultivate.

However, they soon discovered a problem. The energy around them was very thin.

The Dragon Palace had cut off the energy on their side.

They were preparing to send off their guests.

Of course, if they did not cut off their energy, the energy around them would be completely absorbed even if the Dragon Palace had accumulated a lot of energy.

The divine herbs and trees around them were about to wither.

“I’ve heard that the Dragon King has really benefited a lot from his teachings. Although the road ahead is blurry, it’s much better than before.”

“There’s too much time. If His Majesty the Dragon King… I can’t imagine how Far His Majesty the Dragon King has reached.”

“According to His Majesty the Dragon King’s last evolution, it’s no longer possible to break through the chaos. It seems that he needs the help of an incredibly powerful treasure?”

“We’ve really benefited a lot from coming here today. It’s a great fortune for us that the Dragon King can teach us everything. We’ll definitely do our best if the Dragon Palace has any instructions in the future!”

The primal chaos experts spoke with shock, enlightenment, and gratitude.

After listening to the Dragon King’s preaching, they realized that the current Dragon King was unfathomable.

He could easily kill primal chaos experts like them.

This made the primal chaos experts extremely grateful.

“Fellow Daoists, why don’t we go outside and have a dao discussion and share our insights?”

The Alliance Master of the Justice Alliance hesitated for a moment, then said to the other chaos-level experts.

“Hehe, good. The Dragon King has ordered us to stop fighting. Then let’s cultivate together and explore the distant chaotic universe.”

The Alliance Master of the Behemoth Alliance nodded.

“My Lords, let’s go to the base of the Dragon Palace Alliance, the land of origin.”

The three prophets of the Dragon Palace Alliance looked at each other and said to them.

“Okay!”

The experts nodded and immediately went to the land of origin to discuss Dao.

The experts of the Dragon Palace also followed.

After all, it was very beneficial for them to discuss dao with the experts.

Although they had the Dragon King, who could preach dao to them at any time.

Time passed by slowly.

The group of powerhouses discussed their Dao in the land of origin for tens of millions of years before leaving.

After 50 million years, the powerhouses from the Behemoth Alliance, Justice Alliance, Ten Days Federation, and the Dragon Palace Alliance began to set up black hole teleportation formations wantonly.

Including the distance between the two sides.

At the same time, the four major alliances began to explore the more distant chaotic space and search for more universes.

During this period of time, Wang Xian had nothing to do but to absorb resources and accompany the children.

The little ones also grew up one by one. After 50 million years, their strength had reached the peak of the universe’s ruler.

Speaking of which, with Wang Xian’s current strength and with the resources of the Dragon Palace, this speed was considered very slow.

This was because they were more playful.

In addition, it was also because they learned more things.

Not only did they need to cultivate, but they also needed to learn all kinds of zither, chess, calligraphy, and painting.

In addition, Wang Xian, Guan Shuqing, and the rest didn’t care about the cultivation level of the little ones.

They wanted to give them a happy and complete childhood.

They basically didn’t care about cultivation.

More than 50 million years might just be the stage of youth for the children of Heaven’s origin.

During this period, Guan Shuqing and the rest brought the little ones to explore the origin universe.

They began to travel to other universes.

As the saying went, it was better to travel thousands of miles than to read thousands of books.

During this period, Wang Xian absorbed some resources and dealt with the giant beasts of chaos in the land of origin.

After all, it was an extremely huge land of resources.

His strength was comparable to 40 experts of the level of chaos.

As for how strong his actual combat strength was, Wang Xian didn’t know.
